headline.main: IMPORTANT FROM EUROPE.; INTERESTING FROM CHINA. LUCKNOW YET UNRELIEVED. Heavy Deeline in Cotton----Breadstuffs Lower---Activity in American Stocks. Scenes and Incidents of the Assault. American Horses Beaten at Newmarket How the American Bank Suspension is Received Abroad. FALL OF DELHI. One Week's Later News by the Arabia. IMPROVEMENT IN BRITISH FINANCIAL AFFAIRS. Very Important from India. ADVANOE IN CONSOLS.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal Mail steamship Arabia, Capt. STONE, which sailed from Liverpool at 81/2 o'clock on the morning of Saturday the 31st ultimo arrived at this port at about 6 o'clock yesterday morning.
docs.snippet: The Royal Mail steamship Arabia, Capt. STONE, which sailed from Liverpool at 81/2 o'clock on the morning of Saturday the 31st ultimo arrived at this port at about 6 o'clock yesterday morning.

headline.main: THE UNEMPLOYED.; CASES OF DESTITUTION. Movements of the Unemployed--Relief Obtained. STREET CLEANING. What Prospect of Public Work.

docs.lead_paragraph: There was a noticeable falling off in the number of those who have been in the habit of congregating in front of the City Hall as the Unemployed, yesterday. There were a few standing around in groups, but not more than may often be seen on days when no general cry for work or bread is heard.

headline.main: THE EMPEROR OF FRANCE.; Interesting Account of a Visit to Napoleon III.

docs.lead_paragraph: From the New-York Observer. A gentleman in this City has received a private letter of Rev. Mr. STEWART, of the United States Navy, dated Paris, Sept. 22, from which we are pleased to be permitted to publish the following:

headline.main: A Lesson for the Times--Results of a Protective Policy.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Times: A remarkable example of the circumstances into which the most bonest and well-meaning of political teachers may be or occasionally hurried by too evident and impassioned devotion to a pet theory is being at this moment afforded by the position of the two great industrial interests of this country. No idea has been more forcibly presented to the minds of the masses of the northern states.

headline.main: AFFAIRS IN FRANCE.; Post-Office Inconveniences--Prince Murat--Curious Political Trial--Great Improvement in parks--Suicide of an American Speculator.

docs.lead_paragraph: To-day I must commence with a complaint against that constant enemy of Americans in Paris, the English Post-Office Department. Certainly our sufferings have been ameliorated within the last few years, but there is yet an abuse of which our Post-Office Department ought to take cognizance.

docs.lead_paragraph: QUARANTINE.--The large fleet of vessels with signals hanging in the mizzen-rigging have disappeared from quarantine, and nobody now holds his health while passing that locally from fear of inhaling the yellow fever. There are no vessels now arriving subject to quarantine.
